title: Social Plus Social Platform by Asen Sokolov

generalInfo: Social Plus is the new Shared Economy that brings social causes and projects to life through ethical consumption. A social network where people, organizations and companies make possitive changes in our world by discovering each other, creating and backing projects and selling and buying products for good.
typographyDescr: Helvetica is a widely used sans-serif typeface. Over the years a wide range of variants have been released in different weights, widths and sizes, as well as matching designs for a range of non-Latin alphabets.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop a large scale sophisticated social and business platform.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: This is a huge project and we worked on it for more than 6 months. During this time we developed from scratch countless custom widgets like: payments, shipping methods, fundraising modules, users ability to create their own business page/s and sell products through the platform, groups, advertising plugin and many moreâ€¦

The result is a unique Shared Economy where people can shop, sell and help others to create bright and good future for them and the community!

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: XEC-STUDIO
